Title: The checking of the sign out: redirection to page
Description: The checking of the sign out: redirection to page via "SIGN OUT" button on the "Compare" page
Pre-condition:
1. The user is authorized on site.
2. The registration page was opened on the site: http://localhost:3000/compare (Link: http://localhost:3000/compare )
Steps: Click on the "SIGN OUT" button in header.
Expected Result: The "Sign In" page is shown, user made a logout.

Title: The checking of the show all elements in table
Description: The checking of the show all elements in table
Pre-condition:
1. The user is authorized on site.
2. The registration page was opened on the site: http://localhost:3000/compare (Link: http://localhost:3000/compare ) 
3. The comparison table is shown with 4 columns of all available phone characteristics.
Expected Result: The 4 "REMOVE" buttons are shown and table with phone data is shown too.

Title: The checking of the hide all elements in the table
Description: The checking of the hide all elements in the table
Pre-condition:
1. The user is authorized on site.
2. The registration page was opened on the site: http://localhost:3000/compare (Link: http://localhost:3000/compare ) 
3. The comparison table is shown with 3 columns of all available phone characteristics.
Expected Result: The 4 "COMPARE" buttons are shown and table with phone data is hidden now.

Title: The checking of the display 4 cards with phone model data
Description: The checking of the display 4 cards with phone model data
Pre-condition:
1. The user is authorized on site.
2. The registration page was opened on the site: http://localhost:3000/compare (Link: http://localhost:3000/compare )
Expected Result: All 4 images are displayed in card view.
All 4 model names are shown in card view.

Steps: See the price (x - y),  it's template from x to y.
Expected Result: All prices are shown too in card view.
